title: South Mysore
creator_credit: AMA and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: An American family holidaying in Bangalor and the surrounding district. The tourist facilities; Mysore City; the palaces, markets and temples; street entertainers, formal gardens, festivals, visits to game reserves; the Jain monuments; local customs and folk dances.
description: An American family holidaying in Bangalor and the surrounding district. The tourist facilities; Mysore City; the palaces, markets and temples; street entertainers, formal gardens, festivals, visits to game reserves; the Jain monuments; local customs and folk dances.
